Environmental - Contributes To Leed Mr Credit 4.1&4.2, Recycled Content. Contributes To Leed Ieq Credit 4.5, Low Emitting Materials, Systems Furniture And Seating. Contributes To Leed Hc Mr Credit 5, Furniture And Medical Furnishings. Greenguard Certified And Greenguard Children & Schools Certified. Heavy Metal Free Dyes With High Exhaustion Rates. Pfoa Free Finish.
